1010101010000101 0110101001101001 1 -> sum: 0001010011101111, cout: 1
0100000000100100 0110111101010011 1 -> sum: 1010111101111000, cout: 0
1111111001110010 1001010010000011 0 -> sum: 1001001011110101, cout: 1
1011100001110010 1100011100001011 0 -> sum: 0111111101111101, cout: 1
0001111100111110 1110110110100101 1 -> sum: 0000110011100100, cout: 1
0000000101110110 0000111100000011 0 -> sum: 0001000001111001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
